product_name: Gibbon Slackrack Freestanding Slackline Kit - 10 ft.
long_description: The Gibbon Slackrack Freestanding slackline kit makes it easy to setup a slackline just about anywhere. It's a great solution for slacklining in a gym, health club or in your own home.
short_description: The Gibbon Slackrack Freestanding slackline kit makes it easy to setup a slackline just about anywhere. It's a great solution for slacklining in a gym, health club or in your own home.
